categories: Category:Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire

nodes.text: Assignment: Decoy was a three-episode adventure outline for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was published in Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 7 and written by Bill Smith, with illustrations by Shawn Martinbrough.
The plot was intended as a tie-in to Shadows of the Empire, and is presented as happening "behind the scenes" during the events of that novel.
